increments.name: Core Mob Grouping
increments.description: Enable GMs to group minion tokens into mobs and execute unified actions

stories.title: Create Mob from Selected Minions
stories.i_want: to select multiple minion tokens and group them into a mob
stories.so_that: I can control them as a single unit instead of clicking each one individually
acceptance_criteria: GM can select multiple minion tokens in Foundry
GM can create a mob from selected tokens
Mob is persisted and visible in mob management UI
All tokens in the mob are marked as belonging to that mob

stories.title: Execute Unified Action on Mob
stories.i_want: to click any minion token in a mob and have all members perform the same action
stories.so_that: I don't have to manually command each minion separately during combat
acceptance_criteria: GM clicks any token in the mob
Action selection interface appears
When action is selected, all mob members execute the same action
Actions complete successfully for all valid targets

stories.title: Edit Mob Membership
stories.i_want: to add or remove minions from an existing mob
stories.so_that: I can adjust mob composition as the encounter evolves
acceptance_criteria: GM can access mob editing interface
GM can add new minions to existing mob
GM can remove minions from mob
Changes are immediately reflected in mob behavior

increments.name: Strategy-Based Target Selection
increments.description: Enable mobs to automatically select targets based on combat strategies

stories.title: Assign Strategy to Mob
stories.i_want: to select a combat strategy for a mob (attack strongest, attack weakest, attack most damaged, defend leader)
stories.so_that: the mob automatically selects appropriate targets without manual selection
acceptance_criteria: GM can access strategy selection UI for a mob
Available strategies are displayed (attack strongest, weakest, most damaged, defend leader)
GM can assign a strategy to the mob
Strategy is persisted with the mob

stories.title: Attack Strongest Target Strategy
stories.i_want: mob with 'attack strongest' strategy to automatically target the most powerful enemy
stories.so_that: the mob focuses fire on dangerous threats
acceptance_criteria: Strategy identifies strongest target based on power level/stats
All mob members attack the identified target
Target selection updates if strongest target changes
Strategy works correctly in Foundry combat system

stories.title: Attack Weakest Target Strategy
stories.i_want: mob with 'attack weakest' strategy to automatically target the most vulnerable enemy
stories.so_that: the mob eliminates easy targets quickly
acceptance_criteria: Strategy identifies weakest target based on current health/power
All mob members attack the identified target
Target selection updates if weakest target changes
Strategy works correctly in Foundry combat system

stories.title: Attack Most Damaged Strategy
stories.i_want: mob with 'attack most damaged' strategy to automatically target the most injured enemy
stories.so_that: the mob finishes off wounded targets
acceptance_criteria: Strategy identifies most damaged target based on health/damage taken
All mob members attack the identified target
Target selection updates as damage changes
Strategy works correctly in Foundry combat system

stories.title: Defend Leader Strategy
stories.i_want: mob with 'defend leader' strategy to protect a designated leader
acceptance_criteria: GM can designate a leader for the mob
Mob members position near leader
Mob attacks threats targeting the leader
Strategy works correctly in Foundry combat system

increments.name: Combat Action Execution
increments.description: Handle range/melee attacks and movement within Foundry VTT combat system

stories.title: Melee Attack Execution
stories.i_want: mob members to move to target and execute melee attacks
acceptance_criteria: System detects when target requires melee range
Mob members move to melee range of target
Melee attacks are executed through Foundry combat system
Attack results are displayed correctly

stories.title: Ranged Attack Execution
stories.i_want: mob members to execute ranged attacks without moving if within range
acceptance_criteria: System detects when target is within ranged attack range
Mob members execute ranged attacks without unnecessary movement
Range limitations are respected
Attack results are displayed correctly

stories.title: Handle Out of Range Scenarios
stories.i_want: to be notified when mob members cannot reach their targets
acceptance_criteria: System detects when targets are out of range
Clear notification is displayed to GM
Mob members that can reach target still execute actions
No errors occur for unreachable targets

increments.name: Mob Templates and Spawning
increments.description: Create reusable mob templates for quick spawning

stories.title: Create Mob Template
stories.i_want: to save a mob configuration as a reusable template
stories.so_that: I can quickly spawn similar mobs in future encounters
acceptance_criteria: GM can access template creation interface
GM can define mob composition (minion types, count, strategy)
Template is saved with descriptive name
Template appears in available templates list

stories.title: Spawn Mob from Template
stories.i_want: to spawn a mob from a saved template
stories.so_that: I can quickly set up encounters
acceptance_criteria: GM can browse available mob templates
GM can select a template and specify spawn location
Mob is created with all minions and configured strategy
Spawned mob is immediately usable

stories.title: Edit and Update Templates
stories.so_that: I can improve templates based on gameplay experience
acceptance_criteria: GM can access template editing interface
GM can modify template composition and strategy
Changes are saved to template
Existing mobs spawned from template are not affected
